title: 2Pcs Ranch Fly Trap Outdoor Fly Catcher Killer Bug Cage Net For Horse Cow Farmer
item_description:
Description：
  Layout method
In spring and autumn, hang it on sunny places, in summer hang it on where it cannot be exposed to sunshine.
Because flies like smelly foods, it is recommended to choose bait as food, such as fish intestines, rotten fruit, fly trap attractant , 20 centimeters away from the ground.
High Fly Catching Efficiency
It can be use multiple times, saving your cost.
Easy to Use
It adopts detachable design, easy to disassemble, easy to replace bait.
Widely Used
Used in many occasions. Green and no harm to human and pets.
  Feature:
Durable & Reusable：Ranch fly trap is made of high quality thickened dense mesh, not easy to scratch damage; Large capacity, good bearing capacity, can collect a large number of flies; Waterproof and UV proof, can easily adapt to outdoor and indoor environment.This fly trap can be hung, folded and reused.
How it Works:The fly which is lured by the scent of the bait, irresistibly enters the trap through the small hole in the center and dies in the absence of food and water. The ranch fly trap is very easy to use,just put the bait-tray into the bottom of trap,put into enough baits,then hang in anywhere you want.
Recommend Bait: When you use, you need to place a certain amount of bait to be effective.We recommend to use fish intestines, rotten fruit other smelly foods which flies like.Please attention:You need to provide the bait by yourself, this product does not come with any fly trap bait.
Widely Used:The fly catcher is non-toxic and harmless,also environmentally and pet friendly.It is suitable for outdoor or indoor hanging ,be used in farms,horse stable,parks,families,markets,restaurants,slaughter houses,green belts, canteens,toilets, garbage houses etc.
Usage steps:
Fix the product bracket well
Fix the pot with the mesh cover hook
Determine all the hooks are perfectly fixed
Add bait to the pot
Simply hang the fly trap about 3' from the ground
Package:
2PCS Fly Trap
